author: John Cooley
comment: Would be 5 stars if Vader were included. How you can have Kylo and not Vader is a head scratcher.  It's a good watch face for Star Wars fans with a few options. I agree background options would be nice. Luke, Obi-wan, and a crybaby that pretends to be a sith....tsk tsk

author: Lite Fifdy
comment: Great all except it would be nice to change the background color, you can barely see Kylo Ren because black is the only color. Even just a white background option would be nice.
title: Cool

author: Damon Roy
comment: The wallpaper dosent stay on the one you choose... it keeps going back to the newer stormtrooper... LG Sport Watch/ Galaxy S8+

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content:
The most common reasons are losting connection or wrong user data. So, the best solution is:
1. Full uninstall (remove from phone and make sure, that app removed from watches)
2. Make sure that devices are paired
3. Install app to the phone
4. Wait, while watch face will appear on watches (this will take some time 2-5 min)

comment: It would be great to have an automatic change of picture after x minutes. Also another feature request is more characters !

author: David Jorgensen
comment: Looks good. Just wish it had Boba Fett
